attributes.action: reduce the ammount of animal related incidents on rural roads.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition has been called for following the recent increace into animal related incidents on rural roads, following the total amount of animal accidents in 2006, when 87 (69 ponies, 13 cattle, 3 pigs and 2 donkies) were killed and 44 (28 ponies, 11 cattle and 4 donkeys) were injured.
